credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Band
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidery using back and long-armed cross stitches, plain weave foundation
description: Linen border embroidered with green silk; the silk outlines the details of the design but also fills in the background entirely. Scenes from the story of Adam and Eve in the Garden; trimmed with linen bobbin lace.
name: Band
